caption: This narrative revolves around a dialogue between the first man and the second man. The first man shows the second man some clues and mentions that someone is trying to get close to him through the second man. They also discuss an imminent terrorist attack and the suspicious behavior of an individual named Moran. Highlights include: the first man presenting clues to the second man, including a lottery ticket and some information about a terrorist attack; the second man's parents come to London, and the first man unexpectedly finds them to be very ordinary people; the first and second men discuss why someone might want to approach the first man through the second man; the first man showcases his clues, involving some spies and suspicious characters; the first man discovers Moran has been an undercover agent working for North Korea since 1996; the two men talk about an impending terrorist attack, but they canâ€™t identify the specific threat; the first man mentions their intelligence agency might have a list of the most obvious threats.
